title: Indesign / quark / xml
content:
has anybody had experience using XML content with indesign or quark? if so, i am looking for some links on how it all works.   
   
thanks in advance   
-j
author: Moore

comments.content: Yeah. Me too. (Excuse me for piggybacking your request, Joshua)

For InDesign, there are some resources and tutorials available at [http://www.adobe.com/products/indesign/crossmedia.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108094406/http:/www.adobe.com/products/indesign/crossmedia.html)
